Rating: 9.5/10

---The good---
= Free!!
= No loss in content. There are no missing or repeated pages.

---Possible Improvements---
= Formatting. While this is my personal, subjective and VERY biased opinion, I prefer the original formatting of the books. It adds to the tecno-dystopian mood of the story.
= Minor scanning errors. There is an error in the first chapter of the first book itself. (I le hates me, instead of "It hates me.)
